articles.description: Canada has gone back-to-back at the speedskating track. Isabelle Weidemann, Ivanie Blondin and Valerie Maltais won gold in the women’s team pursuit for the second Olympics in a row on Tuesday. The Canadians beat the Netherlands in the gold-medal race, erasing an early deficit to take the lead
